backend/main.mo: Defines the actor with authorization and storage mixins plus extensive resident-related types and comparator functions for sorting residents, physicians, and medications.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping implemented features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their responsibilities and UI behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and base styling for consistent theming.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React application and loads the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router and authentication gate handling identity, actor initialization, profile checks, error states, and page routing.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog component for adding ADL records with activity selection, assistance levels, date input, validation, and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog component for entering and submitting daily vital signs for a resident, including validation and unit conversion.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog for recording medication administration events, selecting active medications, and submitting MAR records.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Form dialog to add a new medication for a resident, including dosage, route, schedule, and physician lookup.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Large dialog for creating a new resident with personal info, contacts, insurance, physicians, and initial medications.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog for adding a resident weight entry with date, units, validation, and form submission.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Logo component that loads an image with size modes and shows a text fallback if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog component for editing a resident's medication, managing form state and submitting updates via useEditMedication.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large form dialog for editing a resident's full profile, populating fields from existing data and submitting updates via useUpdateResident.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile setup form allowing a user to enter name, role, and employee ID and save via useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Error screen showing startup failures with diagnostics and options to retry or log out.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity login, logout, stored identity loading, and exposing identity status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, and related backend data through a resilient actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor with timeout handling, identity integration, and optional admin initialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dialog overrides, and print-specific layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides utilities for promise timeouts, error normalization, and identifying non-fatal initialization errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Generates clean, base-path-safe URLs for static assets based on Vite’s configured base URL.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Implements date conversion utilities between strings and nanoseconds plus formatting and age calculation helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the resident dashboard with sorting, filtering, status updates, and resident management actions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with Internet Identity authentication, branding, and a styled card layout.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Displays and manages a resident’s detailed profile with data fetching, editing dialogs, medication updates, and clinical records.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, shadows, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s architecture, features, known issues, and versioned components for the assisted living management system.
